author: vhardy
msg: Added unit testing for ScriptSecurity (i.e., script loading control and contraining script origin)

author: vhardy
msg: This script will mark the test referencing it as passed. It is used in tests checking that scripts are not constrained to come from the same origin as the document referencing them (in some configurations)

author: vhardy
msg: This script will mark the test referencing it as failed. It is used in tests checking that scripts are not loaded as expected in some configurations

author: vhardy
msg: Added security options to rasterizer and updated tests accordingly. Also added test for the 'onload' rasterizer option.
